response.overview: Fām II is a visual music piece that explores the aesthetics of algorithmic processes. Generated from a  A single block of logic-based code, it simultaneously produces and manipulates both audio and visual  streams, forming a perceptual field of pulsation and uncertainty. Through computation and recursion,  the system creates an improvisational sensory phenomenon, detached from symbolic systems of  conceptualization and control.
response.title: fām II
